markdown:
The most ambitious and capable azarketis become tide tamers, learning how to speak with aquatic animals and even train the strongest of these creatures to help defend their territory. Tide tamers act as guardians for their communities, scouts at sea and on the shore, or even entertainers for land-bound people's amusement. They're generally found with one or more aquatic allies whom they've befriended. Several serve alongside Absalom's Wave Riders as scouts, animal interlocutors, and guides. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Azarketi Tide Tamer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1749) **Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 397 **Perception** +15 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14, [Underwater Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11 **Str** +4 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+1 [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_, [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5) --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +18 **Will** +12 **HP** 115 **Hydration** Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a –1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they struggle to breathe air and begin to [suffocate](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) until returned to water.
**Speaker of the Oceans** An azarketi tide tamer can speak with animals that have the [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168) or [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207) trait.
**Submerged Stealth** While submerged in water, an azarketi tide tamer gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check, indicated above. --- **Speed** 25 feet; swim 25 feet **Melee** _trident_ +18 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d8+7 piercing **Ranged** _trident_ +18 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d8+7 piercing **Ranged** hand crossbow +17 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Aquatic Predator** While submerged in water, an azarketi tide tamer takes advantage of the shifting tides to increase the deadliness of their attacks. They deal 2d8 additional damage on a successful weapon Strike while they are underwater.
